creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Bed Cover of embroidered black satin. Design of birds and flowers in shades of blue, green, pink, peach. etc. in satin, laid and knot stitch. Good quality Canton work. Tasselled fringe border of black silk twist. Thin white, silk lining. Embroidered silk.
title: Bed Cover
